  "__added__": {
    "group3": {
      "fee": "100500"
    }
  },
  "__deleted__": {
    "group2": {
      "abc": "12345"
    }
  },
  "common": {
    "__added__": {
      "setting4": "blah blah",
      "setting5": {
        "key5": "value5"
      }
    },
    "__deleted__": {
      "setting2": "200",
      "setting6": {
        "key": "value"
      }
    },
    "setting1": "Value 1",
    "setting3": true,
    "site": {
      "__deleted__": {
        "base": "1234"
      },
      "e2": "22"
    }
  },
  "group1": {
    "__edited__": {
      "baz": {
        "__after__": "bars",
        "__before__": "bas"
      }
    },
    "foo": "bar"
  }
}
